data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in for Sendai at EDION Stadium.
In the minute 1, It's a goal kick for the away team in Hiroshima.
Koei Koya signals a free kick to Sendai.
Hiroshima have a goal kick.
In the minute 3, Sendai's Alexandre Guedes misses with an attempt on goal.
Koei Koya awards Hiroshima a goal kick.
Leandro Pereira puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 4, Sho Sasaki with an assist there.
Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
Koei Koya signals a Hiroshima throw-in in Sendai's half.
In the minute 7, Hiroshima have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Sendai goal kick.
In Hiroshima, Sendai push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 10, Free kick for Hiroshima in the half of Sendai.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Hiroshima's Hayao Kawabe gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 12, Goal kick for Sendai at EDION Stadium.
Koei Koya awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Sendai in Hiroshima.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Sendai in the half of Hiroshima.
Sendai have been awarded a corner by Koei Koya.
Corner awarded to Sendai.
In the minute 16, Hiroshima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Takayoshi Ishihara (Sendai) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Sendai have been awarded a corner by Koei Koya.
In the minute 19, In Hiroshima a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Takumi Mase (Sendai) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Hiroshima defenders.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Hiroshima.
In the minute 25, Can Sendai capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Hiroshima's half?
Koei Koya signals a free kick to Sendai just outside Hiroshima's area.
Koei Koya awards Hiroshima a goal kick.
In the minute 27, Sendai to take a throw-in in Hiroshima territory.
Can Sendai get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hiroshima's half?
Free kick for Hiroshima in their own half.
In the minute 28, Throw-in for Sendai in their own half.
Hiroshima to take a throw-in in Sendai territory.
Sendai have been awarded a corner by Koei Koya.
In the minute 30, Koei Koya signals a free kick to Hiroshima in their own half.
Free kick Sendai.
Sendai needs to be cautious. Hiroshima have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 33, Koei Koya signals a Hiroshima throw-in in Sendai's half.
Throw-in for Hiroshima in the half of Sendai.
Goal kick for Sendai at EDION Stadium.
In the minute 35, Hiroshima's Rhayner breaks free at EDION Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Sendai goal kick.
Can Sendai get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hiroshima's half?
In the minute 37, Throw-in Sendai.
Hiroshima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Sendai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 38, In Hiroshima a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Sendai push upfield and Takuma Hamasaki gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Hiroshima defence.
Corner awarded to Sendai.
In the minute 41, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick Sendai.
Corner awarded to Sendai.
In the minute 43, Hiroshima have a goal kick.
Koei Koya signals a Sendai throw-in in Hiroshima's half.
Koei Koya signals a throw-in for Sendai, close to Hiroshima's area.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
At EDION Stadium the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Hiroshima to take a throw-in in Sendai territory.
In the minute 45, Koei Koya blows to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway at EDION Stadium.
Sendai have been awarded a corner by Koei Koya.
In the minute 46, Can Sendai get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hiroshima's half?
Leandro Pereira's header is off-target for Hiroshima.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Hiroshima.
In the minute 50, Hiroshima pushes forward through Leandro Pereira, whose finish on goal is saved.
Hiroshima's Douglas Vieira gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Sendai at EDION Stadium.
In the minute 51, Sendai awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sendai are in shooting range from this free kick.
Throw-in for Sendai in the half of Hiroshima.
In the minute 56, Throw-in Sendai.
Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
Koei Koya signals a free kick to Sendai.
In the minute 57, Leandro Pereira (Hiroshima) has received a first yellow card.
Sendai drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Sendai in their own half.
In the minute 60, Hiroshima have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Hiroshima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Hiroshi Jofuku is making the team's first substitution at EDION Stadium with Shunki Higashi replacing Yoshifumi Kashiwa.
In the minute 63, The home team replace Tsukasa Morishima with Yuya Asano.
Sendai make their first substitution with Takuma Nishimura replacing Takayoshi Ishihara.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Hiroshima at EDION Stadium.
Koei Koya signals a free kick to Hiroshima in their own half.
Koei Koya awards Hiroshima a goal kick.
In the minute 68, Koei Koya awards the away team a throw-in.
The away team have replaced Koji Hachisuka with Shingo Hyodo. This is the second substitution made today by Takashi Kiyama.
Throw-in for Hiroshima close to the penalty box.
Shingo Hyodo gets an equalizer for Sendai. The score is now 1-1.
In the minute 73, Takumi Mase instrumental with a fine assist.
Free kick for Hiroshima in their own half.
In the minute 74, Takuma Nishimura is booked for the away team.
Throw-in for Sendai in the half of Hiroshima.
Yuya Asano for Hiroshima drives towards goal at EDION Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 79, Hiroshima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Koei Koya waits before resuming play because Rhayner for Hiroshima is still down.
It seems as if Rhayner is unable to continue. Toshihiro Aoyama replaces him for the home team.
In the minute 82, Can Hiroshima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sendai's half?
Free kick for Hiroshima in the half of Sendai.
Throw-in high up the field for Hiroshima in Hiroshima.
In the minute 84, Shun Nagasawa is on a sub for Alexandre Guedes for Sendai.
Ezequiel is replacing Douglas Vieira for the home team.
Free kick for Sendai in the half of Hiroshima.
In the minute 87, Koei Koya signals a Hiroshima throw-in in Sendai's half.
Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Koei Koya.
Free kick in a good position for Hiroshima!
In the minute 89, Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
Ball safe as Hiroshima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Ball goes out of play for a Sendai goal kick.
Hiroshima to take a throw-in in Sendai territory.
Sendai will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Hiroshima.
Free kick Hiroshima.
Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Koei Koya.
The match is over. Final score 1-1.
